item.description:
On Saturday August 21, the Westford Rotary Charitable Endowment, Inc. will be putting on the 9th Annual Brews 'N Blues Festival at the Nashoba Valley Ski Area. The event features:

• Live Music - TOP BLUES BANDS (see below)
• Dozens of Regional Craft Breweries, PLUS a special booth featuring cask-conditioned ale
• GREAT Food, such as BBQ, grilled chicken, hotdogs/hamburgers, Oktoberfest food, snacks, etc!
• Homebrew Competition awards
• Collectible quality program book featuring bands & breweries
• Raffles, Games, Homebrew Demonstrations, Craft & Vendor Booths, more!

Even with the pouring rain last year, this event was a blast! Plus, it is for a good cause, as proceeds benefit a number of non-profit groups.

Tickets cost $30 in advance, or $35 at the door*
(*walk-in admission is subject to availability.)

This year's music line-up includes:

Ken Macy
Smokehouse Lightning
Tokyo Tramps
Danny Banks and his All-Star Band feat. Monster Mike Welch
Bellevue Cadillac
Sugar Blue

Breweries will include:

50 Back
Berkshire Brewing Co.
Blue Hills Brewery
Boston Beer Co. (Samuel Adams)
Boulder Beer
Cape Ann Brewing Company
Coastal Extreme Brewing Co. (Newport Storm)
Cody Brewing
Gardner Ale House
Gritty McDuff's
Harpoon Brewery
Kennebec River Brewery
Long Trail Brewing Company
Magic Hat Brewing Co.
Martha's Exchange
Narragansett Brewing Co.
Otter Creek Brewing Co.
Paper City Brewery
Saranac Brewery
Wachusett Brewing Co.
Woodstock Inn Brewery

Plus, there will be a wine table sponsored by Colonial Spirits
And both Mike's Hard Lemonade and Woodchuck Draft Cider will be available.

*NOTE*
This is a large festival type event and it can be very difficult to find people. As a result, I will email my cell number and a description of what I will be wearing to all yes and maybe RSVPs the morning of the event. If you can't find us, call or text me and I will help direct you to where we are located.
item.name: Blues 'N Brews Festival
